    • addAdaptorSessionToAggregatedSession

      public void addAdaptorSessionToAggregatedSession(UUID sessionKey, String adaptorName) throws at.jku.swe.simcomp.commons.adaptor.endpoint.exception.BadRequestException, org.webjars.NotFoundException, at.jku.swe.simcomp.commons.adaptor.endpoint.exception.SessionInitializationFailedException

      Parameters:
      sessionKey - the session id
      adaptorName - the simulation name
      Throws:
      at.jku.swe.simcomp.commons.adaptor.endpoint.exception.BadRequestException - if the session is already closed or the simulation (type) is already part of the session
      org.webjars.NotFoundException - if the session or the simulation could not be found
      at.jku.swe.simcomp.commons.adaptor.endpoint.exception.SessionInitializationFailedException - if the simulation (adaptor-session) could not be initialized

      Removes a simulation (=adaptor session) from an existing session.
      Parameters:
      sessionKey - the session id
      adaptorName - the simulation name
      Throws:
      at.jku.swe.simcomp.commons.adaptor.endpoint.exception.BadRequestException - if the session is already closed or the simulation (type) is not part of the session, or the adaptor-session is already closed
